document.full_text: charles ferguson, who won an oscar this year for directing the financial-meltdown documentary "inside job," is attached to shoot an hbo films movie about wikileaks founder julian assange.
document.title: "inside job" director to shoot wikileaks film
lines_and_colors: charles ferguson, who won an oscar this year for directing the financial-meltdown documentary "inside job," is attached to shoot an hbo films movie about wikileaks founder julian assange.
